title: Sword of Chaos

points.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The sword of Sarevok, brother of Gorion's Ward and child of the evil god Bhaal. Though much of its power died with him, the sword is still formidable, and glows with a malevolent light.

Greatsword Two-Handed

Sword of Chaos is one of the Greatswords in Baldur's Gate 3. Sword of Chaos is the powerful greatsword wielded by Sarevok. It has a +2 enchantment and deals necrotic damage as well as regaining a bit of health of t
